name: dd
caption: Demand rate
message: Demand rate must be strictly positive. Use the same time unit as the production rate.

name: pp
caption: Production rate
message: The production rate must be strictly positive.

name: order
caption: Setup cost
message: The setup cost must be strictly positive.

name: hh
caption: Holding cost
message: The holding cost must be strictly positive.

name: pipi
caption: Backorder cost
message: Leave the default value in case backorders are disallowed
